thread.title: Credit Controller

title: Credit Controller
text:
Job Ref: 106525 
My Client is a medium-sized law firm in the heart of London’s legal district, with circa 20 Partners. They specialise in the media, digital marketing, green energy, tech and security sectors. 
Due to a period of significant growth, they are recruiting for a stand-alone Credit Controller to join their Accounts Team. The role will manage the firm’s debtors and work with the partners to ensure timely payment of bills. 
Responsibilities 
The primary responsibility will be to chase payments from debtors and reduce the time taken for bills to be paid. The successful individual will also be required to build relationships with the partners, to ensure that bills are sent out in a timely fashion and to work with them to find solutions to any billing issues. 
Candidate Profile 
You will have experience as a Credit Controller in a law firm, or similar professional services. 
Previous experience of accounts software packages and strong Excel skills. 
Highly numerate and able to work with complex bills. 
Important Notice 
It is Career Legal’s policy, as a matter of courtesy, to respond to all applications within three working days. However because of the volume of applications, we are sometimes unable to respond to individual candidates. If we have not contacted you within three working days your application has been unsuccessful and your details have not been retained. Please apply for any other position that you may see in the future. Thank you. 
Career Legal is a Recruitment Agency and is advertising this permanent vacancy on behalf of one of its Clients.
